item.title: A Mind Is Born
item.description: Making a demo in just 256 bytes would be a formidable challenge regardless of platform. A Mind Is Born is my attempt to do it on the Commodore 64. In the absence of an actual 256-byte compo, it was submitted to the Oldskool 4K Intro compo at Revision 2017, where it ended up on 1st place.

item.title: C# 9 records as strongly-typed ids - Part 5: final bits and conclusion
item.description: We’re reaching the end of this series on records as strongly-typed ids. Sorry for the long delay since the last post… life happened! So far we’ve covered ASP.NET Core model binding, JSON serialization, and EF Core integration. Almost everything is working, we just need to fix a few more details. Handling database-generated values in EF Core First, I want to address a question asked by @OpsOwns in the comments of the last post:
item.author: (Thomas Levesque is a French software developer from Paris.)
